name: Block Builder Early Access
description:
This is a game I am working on. Current version has the basic mechanics to allow the user to make things. More things will be added in the near future and a multi-player game mode will be added.

In the next update there will be new block types and textures, the ability to save and you will be able to create your own blocks for easy duplication.

A more helpful and easy to use heads up display will also be coming out in a future update.

The game is in the early stages as such the controls are not the finished product.

Controls:

Q ,E = Turn Left & Right

W,A,S,D = Move

R,F = Look Up & Down

Z = Place Block

X = Create Block

C = Deselect highlighted Block / Clicking on block does the same

V = Delete selected block

Up Arrow = Precision Mode. Allows for fine adjustments

======

When a block is highlighted or you are in precision mode you can use the following keys to allow blocks to be spaced properly

I,J,K,L, Move Block in Direction

H,N Move Block up and down

======

Left/Right Arrow = Change block type

Down Arrow = Change block colour (Block can't be highlighted)

Scroll wheel = Move Up and Down

Click on a block to highlight it.
